word: IT HAS BEEN THOUGHT BEST TO ARRANGE THE SELECTIONS AS FAR AS POSSIBLE IN CHRONOLOGICAL ORDER, GIVING FIRST PLACE TO THOSE WHICH WERE WRITTEN FIRST, AND GIVING CREDIT TO THE SOURCE FROM WHICH EACH WAS TAKEN. BRIEF QUOTATIONS AND PARAGRAPHS ARE ARRANGED IN THE SAME ORDER AND PLACED BY THEMSELVES UNDER THE TITLE “FRAGMENTS,” AT THE CLOSE OF THE WORK.
